text: Mark Horowitz is an American television producer and director. He has produced and directed for JAG, NCIS,Yang, Rachel. "‘NCIS’ Renewed for Season 17 at CBS", Variety, April 11, 2019. and Doogie Howser, M.D.Frym, Michael.
